channel.title: Developer news - DiagRAMS
channel.description: Discover the latest technical news from DiagRAMS.

item.title: Considerations for storing secrets
item.description: When using the DiagRAMS API you will need to store our application id/secret pair, here are some key principles to keep in mind.

item.title: API upgrade methodology
item.description: We took some time to write down our API upgrade methodology in order to let you know how to embrace our API upgrades.

item.title: Training to cybersecurity
item.description: Our commitment to cybersecurity is a never ending quest and our employees are now more confident on their skills thanks to the ANSSI training program.

item.title: 23rd ChtiJS in our office!
item.description: We were happy to welcome the JavaScript community for its 23rd edition.
